a.title: FAQs
a.span: **FAQs Regarding Ledyard Public Schools and COVID-19**

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: transparent; font-size: 13pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Individuals who have general questions that are not answered on the website can also

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: The information line is available 24 hours a day and has multilingual assistance and TDD/TTY access for those with a hearing impairment. The hotline is only intended to be used by individuals who are not experiencing symptoms but may have

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: related to COVID-19. Anyone experiencing symptoms is strongly urged to contact their medical provider to seek treatment.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: The Yale New Haven Health System has set up a COVID-19 HOTLINE 1-203-688-1700 to answer questions from the public regarding COVID-19.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: CT DPH website - Including Behavioral Health resources for coping with stress and talking with children during infectious disease outbreaks:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

a.span: Free Online Mental Health Resources During the Coronavirus Epidemic

a.title: Early Dismissal at 1:00 pm - Professional Development

div.div:
Early Dismissal at 1:00 pm - Professional Development
c

Early Dismissal at 1:00 - Professional Development
c

Grade 1 Field Trip- Mystic Seaport
c

p.span: Please be advised that you are able to call the school offices during our period of school closure. School staff will be answering your calls and forwarding them to the appropriate recipients for timely responses. If no one answers, please leave a message. Someone will return your call.

br.br:
As planned, parents may call schools starting on April 1 to set up an appointment to register their incoming kindergarteners. We will take all the necessary information for registration and schedule appointments for screening. At present, our K screening dates are scheduled for late April and the beginning of May. If needed, we will delay the screening appointments to a later date.
Updates will be posted on the district and elementary school websites.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
